DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation effectiveness cost quantitative qualitative nutritional supplementation elderly patient
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Cost Quantitative Qualitative Nutritional Supplementation Elderly Patients
DOC.criteria: Hospitalization geriatric care unit age > 70 year C reactive protein > 30 mg/l 25 < albumin < 35 g/l 130 < Na < 145 mmol/l BMI < 22 weight loss > 10 % within last 6 month MNA < 23.5 diabetes mellitus severe digestive failure enteral parenteral nutrition renal , cardiac digestive failure lactose intolerance terminal phase severe pathology MMS < 15
